Sentencas: Nanoparticles of lanthanide (Ln)-based zirconates have been prepared through the autoignited combustion technique.
Titulo: Preparation, Characterization, and Ionic Transport Properties of Nanoscale Ln2Zr2O7 (Ln = Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, and Yb) Energy Materials

Sentencas: The structure of the system was analyzed by powder x-ray diffraction and vibrational spectroscopic tools.
Titulo: Preparation, Characterization, and Ionic Transport Properties of Nanoscale Ln2Zr2O7 (Ln = Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, and Yb) Energy Materials

Sentencas: The compounds with Ln = Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, and Gd have pyrochlore cubic structure, whereas those with Ln = Dy, Er, and Yb possess anion-deficient disordered cubic fluorite structure.
Titulo: Preparation, Characterization, and Ionic Transport Properties of Nanoscale Ln2Zr2O7 (Ln = Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, and Yb) Energy Materials

Sentencas: The optical properties of the powder were analyzed using ultraviolet-visible spectroscopy.
Titulo: Preparation, Characterization, and Ionic Transport Properties of Nanoscale Ln2Zr2O7 (Ln = Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, and Yb) Energy Materials

Sentencas: Pellets of the compounds were sintered in the range from 1325 degrees C to 1530 degrees C for 2 h. The surface morphology of sintered Nd2Zr2O7 was analyzed by scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Preparation, Characterization, and Ionic Transport Properties of Nanoscale Ln2Zr2O7 (Ln = Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, and Yb) Energy Materials

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopic studies of the samples were carried out at different temperatures.
Titulo: Preparation, Characterization, and Ionic Transport Properties of Nanoscale Ln2Zr2O7 (Ln = Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, and Yb) Energy Materials
